I really liked the pockets on this one. They just worked so well for my cards. I like the colors and the design. Two things bothered me though: first, the edges along the fold wore out really fast. It started out with some slight fraying but they completely separated over time. second, I kept running into people who had the exact same wallet. the color and the little medallion really stand out so it's easy to notice. and there were a few cashiers who would let me know that they had the same wallet. I guess there's a bit of comradery but I prefer to have a less mass-produced, recognizable wallet.

评论概述: Gsoiax wallet in this model is stunning wth awesome gadgets
评论详情: I appreciated GSOIAX's wallet because of it's storage capacity being so full, the leather is extremely high end and soft, there's some ease of access, and I can tell the durability will allow this wallet to last a long time which matters!  I personally was looking for a magnetic clasp and something very simplistic but otherwise if my friend whom I was getting this wallet for didn't care about that, I feel the durability made for an excellent wallet and it was affordable especially because of the luxury box it came in and the luxury leather, compartments that fold just fine!  Again, for my gift needs I gave it a 4, but the wallet itself deserves a 5 stars...for anyone else unless you're looking for that snap, magnetic bill close! Other than that, this is a really high end wallet at a great low price which surprised me!
